p: The essential oil of the leaves was extracted by hydrodistillation in a Clevenger type apparatus. Briefly, the dried leaves (50 g) were crushed and placed in a 5.0 L glass flask containing 1 L of distilled water, with three repetitions. This material was extracted at boiling temperature for 2.5 h. After extraction, the oil was collected with a precision pipette and stored under refrigeration until testing.
